welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chengdu, the land of spicy Sichuan cuisine, adorable pandas, and laid-back teahouse culture. We hope you enjoy exploring the city's charming streets and experiencing its unique blend of tradition and modernity. Have a wonderful time in Chengdu!

restaurants.name: 小名堂担担甜水面
restaurants.description: 小名堂担担甜水面 is a chinese restaurant located in 成都市.
restaurants.address: 青羊区将军街 1 号达州宾馆 1 楼 (近东城根上街), 成都市, 四川

restaurants.address: 科甲巷伊势丹7楼 (红星路步行街), 成都市, 四川

restaurants.description: Niccolo Kitchen is a italian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shuangliu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Shuangliu Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
